top_comments.comment: Much respect and appreciation to former AG Mukul Rohatgi! His very focused straightforward approach in this case helped to achieve Aryan's bail. Would like to see Rohatgi lead the charge of reforming the system.

Why media, politicians, celebrities, highly paid lawyers are coming out in support of drug accuseds and find faults with the agencies responsible of curbing drug menace. Is it big money of international pedlars. Most shameful is celebrations by celebrities on granting of bail
